entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
